properties.entry: SELECT P.POST_NO , P.POST_CONTENT , M.NICKNAME , M.USER_FILE_RENAME , PF.POST_FILE_RENAME , PC.PCOM_CONTENT FROM POST P, MEMBER M, POST_FILE PF, POST_COMMENT PC WHERE M.USER_NO = P.USER_NO AND P.POST_NO = PF.POST_NO AND P.USER_NO = PC.USER_NO AND POST_CONTENT LIKE '집들이%' ORDER BY POST_CREATE_DATE DESC
UPDATE POST SET POST_COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS= 'Y'
SELECT NICKNAME , PCOM_CONTENT FROM MEMBER M JOIN POST_COMMENT ON (M.USER_NO = POST_COMMENT.USER_NO)

INSERT INTO POST ( POST_NO , USER_NO , POST_TITLE , POST_CONTENT
) VALUES ( SEQ_PONO.NEXTVAL ,SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL ,? ,? )
INSERT INTO POST_FILE ( POST_FILE_NO , POST_NO , POST_FILE_RENAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_POFNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_PONO.CURRVAL , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM POST WHERE POST_CATE_NAME = '집들이' AND POST_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NO , A.* FROM( SELECT EMAIL , POST_TITLE , POST_CREATE_DATE , POST_COUNT FROM POST P JOIN MEMBER ON (P.USER_NO = MEMBER.USER_NO) WHERE POST_STATUS = 'Y' AND POST_CATE_NAME LIKE '집들이' ORDER BY POST_CREATE_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE NO BETWEEN ? AND ?
